about_the_game:
You're a thrill seeking bear, equipped with the latest hoverboard technology, it is your mission to go fast and get to the finish line before anyone else. Any tricks performed along the way are at your own risk!

Hoverbear explores the limits of adrenaline with a variety of custom maps and thrilling game modes. Race down mountainous slopes and beautiful landscapes while enjoying the thrill of an adventure pack race down the steep slopes, or a casual and chill drifting experience through the flats.
